name: Snow (itch) (EmilyEm)
description:
Explore around the environment. Try hop on the train and see what happens.

The goal is to create an atmospheric environment, for player to immerse into the game, and enjoy the quietness and loneliness. 
The player can click on different objects in the scene and words will appear. The objects that can be clicked is: The whole train platform, the train, the person reading the book, and the door. 
The player can also board on the train and travel to the second place. 
The second place is a platform with a door and orange light, when the player sees the orange light and the train sound effect stops playing, it's an indication to get off the train.
However, when the player is on the train and the train starts moving, he can not move.

Controls: 'WASD' to move, space to jump, use mouse to click.
